title: Why doesn't drawing a letter open the corresponding application?
answer:
1. Check whether you blocked the light sensor when drawing the letter. If you draw near or block the light sensor, your input may not be recognized. 

 1. You can set up the letters to be drawn in Settings > Motion control > Draw. Presently only the letters c, e, m, and w are supported. 

 1. When drawing a letter, make sure you complete it in one stroke.
